description: Client performance is what shapes your product and determines the satisfaction of your users. Users don't expect things to happen fast, they expect things to happen immediately. In the presentation we will cover some real-life examples of how to greatly improve performance in web products and share a lot of tricks and cool stuff we've learned along the way.

title: BOOM Performance
